thread.title: Chris Rock Gets Mixed Response Over Lamar Odom Joke
thread.title_full: Chris Rock Gets Mixed Response Over Lamar Odom Joke

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Chris Rock Gets Mixed Response Over Lamar Odom Joke
text:
— H Ahmed (@Amexken) October 23, 2015 @chrisrock Hahahaha he got it right!! — Yo Soy Mel (@MelPeraza) October 23, 2015 @chrisrock Not sure if I should consider this inappropriate or hail you as a God damn genius — Jeff Rothman (@amazingjr87) October 23, 2015 Lamar Odom was hospitalized in Las Vegas after found unconscious at a brothel. He has since been transferred to Los Angeles. Khloe Kardashian has been staying by his side since he was in coma. The couple recently called off their divorce. Chris Rock made the joke after he was announced as a host for the upcoming 88th annual Academy Awards. The 2016 Oscar will mark his second hosting gig at the movie's biggest night. He previously served as an Oscar emcee in 2005.
